titleStmt.title: A short vievv of the long life and raigne of Henry the Third, King of England presented to King Iames.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Cotton by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Frontispiece portrait of Henry III inserted between p. [2]-3.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
